page.title: 03I LIVE IN HUNNINGHAM IN 1985
page.content: As I live in the country me and {my sister Amy}have to play together. When we want to play a game we usually need 3 or 4 to play so we have to think of another game to play and that is usually boring.We have not any pets so we can't play with them.We used to have{3 goldfish}but you couldn't play with them.My{house}is just like an ordinary house.The{kitchen}is fairly big.The{lounge}is big.The{dining room is smaller than the lounge.My{mum and {dad's room}is big and{my sister's}is as big as the dining room.I think{my {room}is as big as my mum and dad's room.The{bathroom}is not big and not small.We have got a{playroom}and we keep some of our toys in there in a toycupboard.
